description: Detects when a all the rules have been deleted from the Windows Defender Firewall configuration
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: All Rules Have Been Deleted From The Windows Firewall Configuration
query: ((winlog.event_id:("2033" OR "2059") AND (NOT ((ModifyingApplication:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (ModifyingApplication:"C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe")))) AND (NOT (ModifyingApplication:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND ModifyingApplication:*\\MsMpEng.exe)))
